main: I sense immense power in you! The Red Dragon Army is recruiting even regular humans for a better world!
Even? Pray tell what's 'even' about 'regular humans', you demonkin bellend.
Typical Human! So quick to anger.
You physically accost Beatrix to prevent an inevitable escalation
